parameters.name: pagination.key
parameters.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

parameters.name: pagination.offset
parameters.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

parameters.name: pagination.limit
parameters.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

parameters.name: pagination.countTotal
parameters.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

parameters.name: pagination.reverse
parameters.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

get.summary:
DidByAlsoKnownAs returns DIDDocument based on an alias *only Sonr
Identities.

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description:
aka_aliasid is the unique identifier of the DIDDocument - it appears like
("example.snr")

get.summary:
AliasAvailable checks if a given alias is available to register *only Sonr
Identities.

parameters.name: alias
parameters.description:
alias is the unique identifier of the DIDDocument - it appears like
("example.snr")

get.summary: ControllerAccount queries a list of ControllerAccount items.
DidByOwner returns DIDDocument based on an owner.
DIDDocument queries a list of DIDDocument items.
Params queries the parameters of the module.

context.title: The JSON-LD context(s) used in the document

id.title: The identifier for the DID subject

controller.title: optional, the entity/entities controlling the DID subject

authentication.title: optional, the set of authentication methods associated with the DID

assertionMethod.title: optional, the set of assertion methods associated with the DID

capabilityInvocation.title: optional, the set of capability invocation methods associated with

capabilityDelegation.title: optional, the set of capability delegation methods associated with

keyAgreement.title: optional, the set of key agreement methods associated with the DID

alsoKnownAs.title: optional, the set of identifiers for other personas or identities

identityDIDDocument.description:
DIDDocument represents a Decentralized Identifier (DID) document that
contains information about the DID subject, such as public keys, verification
methods, and services.

identityParams.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.

identityQueryAliasAvailableResponse.description:
QueryAliasAvailableResponse is the response type for the Query/AliasAvailable
RPC method.

identityQueryAllControllerAccountRespons.description:
QueryAllControllerAccountResponse is the response type for the
Query/ControllerAccountAll RPC method.

identityQueryAllDIDDocumentResponse.description:
QueryAllDIDDocumentResponse is the response type for the Query/DIDDocumentAll
RPC method.

didDocument.title: A DIDDocument is a JSON-LD object that contains a set of public keys

identityQueryDidByAlsoKnownAsResponse.description:
QueryDidByAlsoKnownAsResponse is the response type for the
Query/DidByAlsoKnownAs RPC method.

identityQueryDidByOwnerResponse.description:
QueryDidByOwnerResponse is the response type for the Query/DidByOwner RPC
method.

identityQueryGetControllerAccountRespons.description:
QueryGetControllerAccountResponse is the response type for the
Query/ControllerAccount RPC method.

identityQueryGetDIDDocumentResponse.description:
QueryGetDIDDocumentResponse is the response type for the Query/DIDDocument
RPC method.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

identityQueryParamsResponse.description: QueryParamsResponse is response type for the Query/Params RPC method.

id.title: The identifier for the verification method

type.title: The type of the verification method

controller.title: The entity controlling the verification method

publicKeyJwk.title: optional, the public key in JSON Web Key (JWK) format

publicKeyMultibase.title: optional, the public key in multibase-encoded format

blockchainAccountId.title: optional, the blockchain account identifier associated with the

attestationType.title: optional, the type of attestation associated with the verification

transports.title: optional, the set of transport protocols supported by the

identityVerificationMethod.description:
VerificationMethod represents a verification method that can be used to
authenticate the DID subject or perform other cryptographic operations.

verificationMethod.title: The verification method associated with the relationship

reference.title: The reference identifier for the relationship

type.title: The type of the verification relationship

owner.title: The idx address of the owner of the verification relationship

identityVerificationRelationship.description:
VerificationRelationship represents a relationship between a verification
method and a specific verification purpose (e.g., authentication, assertion,
etc.).

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

countTotal.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

reverse.description:
reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

Since: cosmos-sdk 0.43

v1beta1PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

nextKey.description:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if
there are no more results.

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise
